meanings.sent1: The infalling leaves created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The infalling snow covered the entire town in a blanket of white.
meanings.sent3: The infalling rain caught everyone by surprise during the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her infalling tears reflected the sadness in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The infalling darkness enveloped the forest in a mysterious shroud.

meanings.definition: The act of falling or moving inward
meanings.sent1: The infalling of the waterfall created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent2: The infalling of the meteorite was captured on camera.
meanings.sent3: The infalling of confetti marked the beginning of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The infalling of prices attracted many shoppers to the store.
meanings.sent5: The infalling of petals signaled the start of spring.
